originalText.text:
Surpass our Expectations!

Amazing team! Starlight surpass our expectations. Quality radio interviews and solid magazine placements. Our streams and social media grew tremendously and all organically. You get what you pay for! Looking forward to our next campaign mid summer!

originalText.text: Dont make the mistake that I made by trusting these crooks. Don’t be fooled by the usual fake reviews from employees and friends and family of the business owner. This “company”’s social media promotion service is a SCAM. If that’s your thing, you can get the same fake followers and bots from other similar companies for a FRACTION of what these people charge. I had to rewrite almost entirely the blog article that their so-called journalist wrote after interviewing me. Her writing was at or below high school level. I had a surge in INACTIVE TikTok followers over a few hours on one day and ZERO after that. Likewise, the one song that I hired the company to promote got thousands of views on YouTube overnight, all at once, but none of the other videos on my YouTube channel received one single additional view, and I gained ZERO new YouTube follower during the fake campaign that the “company” ran for me. Marc Carlton and Therese Dominique O. Lopez are both SCAM ARTISTS and will soon face legal consequences for defrauding musical artists looking for authentic exposure and promotion. STAY FAR AWAY.

originalText.text: For artists who want the real thing, Starlight PR is the way to go. If you’re looking for low level promo this is not it. The team at Starlight are well connected seasoned professionals with in-depth knowledge of the PR and marketing industry. Our marketing rollout was nothing short of spectacular. We will be using again for our next release…

originalText.text: It is one of the few artist promotions we have tried that actually works. We highly recommend them

text.text: It is one of the few artist promotions we have tried that actually works. We highly recommend them

originalText.text: I'm shockingly very disappointed in my services with this company. It's been almost a month since I started my starter package which set back traffic I could've gotten for my release date. I just feel as though everything is unorganized. And the blog placements I received are not the same placements mentioned on the website. It looked as though I was placed on low budget blogs. Also, they set me up with a radio interview with a podcast that has no followers or engagement. That defeats the whole purpose of everything that I'm doing. And last but not least after I was placed on blogs  I started getting spam comments on my video that I was promoting. Every single comment was spam. So are these websites real people?? I most definitely want a refund.
